plot: As a joke, two high school seniors create a fake drug and call it Woodrow Wilson. The joke is on them when the whole student body becomes 'addicted' to their fake drug.
title: Woodrow Wilson
plot_es: As a joke, two high school seniors create a fake drug and call it Woodrow Wilson. The joke is on them when the whole student body becomes 'addicted' to their fake drug.
plot_en: As a joke, two high school seniors create a fake drug and call it Woodrow Wilson. The joke is on them when the whole student body becomes 'addicted' to their fake drug.
